programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating it has claimed the lives of millions. Using incredible archive and footages, We'll relive these weather spectacles, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Greater Mekong Special
programme.desc: With a huge extended family scattered throughout Vietnam, Luke is inspired to learn that they all have one thing in common - a love for food. On our journey of Vietnam's southern region, we travel from Saigon, through the Mekong Delta, and north along the coast to the World Heritage-listed city of Hoi An.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S20
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: CAMOKAKIS: Whole Lot Fall In!
programme.desc: What are the roles of combat engineers in the SAF and what is it like to don a 32kg bomb suit? Shawn Thia, Das, Walter Tay and Barbara Latimer join team leaders Paul Foster and Laanya Erza as they discover what it takes to protect our homeland the tough yet fun way.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38
programme.desc: (Encore) This gameshow features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Planet Action S2
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Mirette Investigates
programme.desc: Follow Mirette and Jean-Pat on their thrilling adventures around the world, and enjoy laughter and moments of friendship!

programme.title: Nefertine On The Nile
programme.desc: Nefertine is an eight-year-old girl who lives in ancient Egypt and is gifted with inexhaustible curiosity and courage. She occasionally gets herself into sticky situations, but luckily her trusted friend Piramses is always there to give her a hand. The two friends, accompanied by the cat Micerina, go on incredible adventures, from investigating mysterious mummies to discovering the secrets of the sphinx!

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: Mindy has finally turned 5 and is super excited that she is now officially allowed to go to space. However, when the kids come over to take her, Mindy's friend Lillian has just come over with a tea set for her birthday present. Lillian wants to have a tea party with Mindy, but gets called away for gymnastics practice. Jet and the others offer to relocate Mindy's tea party to the Moon.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe S2
programme.desc: Animated series about a fairy and her adventures running a neighborhood cafe with her friends.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The gang visit the monster cactus at the beach but it's too hot. They create a giant fan and get blown out to sea by the Imp. It's up to the monster cactus to save the gang... but how can he get to them when they're in the water? Rover joins a pet competition and finds that he is way behind all the other pets in terms of ability. But when the Imp shows up to steal the other pets, Rover shows him what he's really made of.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2
programme.desc: Travelling the world with their teacher, mentor and friend Ubercorn, a disco-grooving unicorn, the Go Jetters are fixing the mishaps caused by the mischievous meddlings of Grandmaster Glitch in new locations including Central Park in New York, Machu Picchu, China, Japan, Mali, and Petra in Jordan. And now we get to know our plucky international heroes, Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz even better, as Series 2 takes us to the top-secret island home of the Go Jet Academy to see them intraining.

programme.title: Sesame Street S48
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment starring Cookie Monster in "Cookie Monster's Foodie Truck". And look out for special guest appearances by international Sesame Street characters Chamki (from Galli Galli Sim Sim), Lily (from Zhima Jie: Da Niao Kan Shijie) and Zuzu (from Takalani Sesame).

programme.title: Ping And Friends
programme.desc: Ping is a songbird and each episode she joins with her friends to create a new song, inspired by some occurrence or problem in their everyday lives. If life's a song, they're going to sing it!

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: Paula and friends are on an adventure on Treasure Island to discover a real pirate flag from Captain Redbeard. However, Captain Redbeard is missing when they arrive, and he leaves them with a mission to build him a boat and a sail. Will the scheming Captain Redbeard reveal the real pirate flag to the children?

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Ben kick starts his plans to discredit Vanessa in his quest to gain full custody of Grace. Khairul starts to pursue Izzy. Izzy is not interested in him but they find out they actually have something in common.

programme.title: My Little Chef
programme.desc: Six-year-old twins Evan and Alexa are planning to make a meal to reward their parents, TV presenters Kui Jien and Sarah Tan. Enlai quickly finds out that while the twins have the right fighting spirit to take on the challenge, they have never made anything in the kitchen by themselves before. Will they be able to overcome the hustle and bustle in the kitchen to create an unforgettable meal?

programme.title: The Mekong River With Sue Perkins
programme.desc: In this third episode, Sue reaches Laos, one of the poorest and least developed of all the Mekong nations. It's a country shaped by both Buddhism and Communism, and has hardly changed for centuries. Today, the beauty of its landscapes and people is bringing in foreign tourists - backpackers in search of un-spoilt Asia. Sue spends time with Bounsom, a fisherman who's turned to tourism, setting up a restaurant on the beach.

programme.title: Third Rail
programme.desc: On an off-peak train, Geri gets into an argument with a young lawyer in one cabin, while Jacob who is out playing truant unexpectedly chances upon his mother and her client in another. The train comes to an abrupt stop in the middle of the tunnel and the passengers find themselves being held hostage by four masked hijackers. They claim it is not their intention to hurt anyone but proceed to bomb the last carriage of the train.

programme.title: The Mekong River With Sue Perkins
programme.desc: In this fourth and final episode, Sue reaches her final destination - China, home to the source of this mighty river. Here change is sweeping through faster than any other Mekong nation, as China's economic miracle transforms even the remotest regions. Arriving in Yunnan's tropical south-western region of Xishuangbanna, Sue discovers how this once remote and sleepy region is now home to a booming tourist industry, with the indigenous Dai tribe at its heart.(c)

programme.desc: After the kids successfully grow potato plants in Jet's back yard garden, Jet wants to try to grow them on Mars. Eventually they make a little greenhouse habitat to successfully grow the potato, a la The Martian.
